questionTitle: Which does C in FCAPS stand for?
questionExplanation: Your management responsibilities depend on the particular service model for your cloud deployment.

questionOption1: Cloud computing deployments must be monitored and managed in order to be optimized for best performance
questionOption2: To the problems associated with analyzing distributed network applications, the cloud adds the complexity of virtual infrastructure
questionOption3: Cloud management software provides capabilities for managing faults
questionExplanation: Framework products are being re-positioned to work with cloud systems.

questionTitle: Which of the following aims to deploy methods for measuring various aspects of cloud performance in a standard way?
questionExplanation: SMI stands for Service Measurement Index.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not the feature of Network management systems?
questionExplanation: Most network management packages have one or more of these characteristics.

questionOption1: Cloud management includes not only managing resources in the cloud but managing resources on-premises
questionOption2: The management of resources in the cloud requires new technology
questionOption3: Management of resources on-premises allows vendors to use well-established network management technologies
questionExplanation: The lifecycle of a cloud application includes six defined parts, and each must be managed.

questionTitle: Which of the following package provides all five elements of FCAPS?
questionExplanation: No single package provides all five elements of FCAPS.

questionTitle: ___________ is a framework tool for managing cloud infrastructure.
questionExplanation: Tivoli Service Automation Manager lets you create and stage cloud-based servers.

questionTitle: Which of the following “cloudly” characteristics that cloud management service must have?
questionOption1: Billing is on a pay-as-you-go basis
questionOption2: The management service is extremely scalable
questionExplanation: Communication between the cloud and other systems uses cloud networking standards.

questionTitle: How many categories need to be monitored for entire cloud computing?
questionExplanation: To monitor an entire cloud computing deployment stack, you monitor six different categories.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a standard protocol for network monitoring and discovery?
questionExplanation: WMI stands for Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI).
